author: Vexed (Vexed#0714)
description: Create, comment, labelify and close GitHub issues, with partial PR support.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing! Load the cog and get started with the `calculator` command.

This cog has docs! Check them out at <https://go.vexcodes.com/c/ghissues>
name: GHIssues
short: Create, comment, labelify and close GitHub issues.
